summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5276 for the improvement of 56th Avenue Southwest, from West Andover Street to Hillcrest Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 61031, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
